# OBJECT::SET_IS_OBJECT_ARTICULATED

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** object
* **BOOL** isArticulated

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets whether an object is going to be used as an ariculated prop
